item.title: Jupyter Notebook Test
item.description: import pandas as pd import numpy as np import pandas_profiling import matplotlib as plt import seaborn as sns x = np.random.normal(size=(420,2)) y = pd.DataFrame(x) report = pandas_profiling.ProfileReport(y) report .variablerow { border: 1px solid #e1e1e8; border-top: hidden; padding-top: 2em; padding-bottom: 2em; padding-left: 1em; padding-right: 1em; } .headerrow { border: 1px solid #e1e1e8; background-color: #f5f5f5; padding: 2em; } .namecol { margin-top: -1em; overflow-x: auto; } .dl-horizontal dt { text-align: left; padding-right: 1em; white-space: normal; } .

item.title: First Post
